author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
<@&652918665943056397> Does the Netheremind node stops responsing to JSON-RPC calls while syncing?
I am seeing the following in one of our nodes:

> Syncing previously downloaded blocks from DB (partial offline mode until it finishes)

And JSON-RPC or Engine API aren't working. I am not sure if it is a config issue or if the APIs are down while on this syncing state or something.

author: __flcl
content: Not sure, but neth will diffenetelly not respond before initialization banner appearence in the log

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: ok I'll give it some time and see if catches up and eveyrhint else comes online

author: smartprogrammer
content: Yeah, nethermind processes previously downloaded blocks before initialization of the RPC services. Some time should eleviate that
